name: Leviathan Starblade (itch)
description:
Use your starblade to deflect projectiles while you blast hordes of alien invaders in this 7 mission demo. Choose between multiple ships, styles, and colors. Equip your ship with 2 of 9 gun types and 5 starblades, each with their own special ability. Customize your ship then go wreck some aliens! No extra lives. Miss 10 or more enemy ships on a mission and you lose.

Go vote on our steam greenlight page: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/...
